subject: Review Check Positive Pay exceptions by {{{event.cutOffTime}}} today
body:
Dear {{{user.preferredName}}} {{{user.familyName}}},

You have new exceptions that need to be reviewed by {{{event.cutOffTime}}} today.

If you do not review them before this cut-off time, they will be {{#eq event.defaultDecision 'PAY' }}paid{{else}}rejected{{/eq}}.

To review your exceptions:

	* Log in to Backbase
	* Go to Check Positive Pay
	* Click Exceptions-Active

If you have any questions about this email, please contact [contact details].

Regards,

[Responsible Dept name]
